name: The Last Cave
description:
You find yourself awake in a small cave, with only a bed made of twigs and leaves, a kettle for water, and a campfire for warmth. You must survive, even if there are no predators around.

Background Assets made by edermunizz

Player Assets made by rvros

Music made by my friend, K3NN, go drop him a follow ;)

Grass and Stone tilesets made by me

This is just a demo, I do plan on making a proper game based on this concept, and this is also the very first game (demo) that i'm releasing/made, and honestly this was an interesting experience and can't wait to see what more there is to come.

Made for the "My First Game Jam" Summer 2021 Game Jam.

That's all! Jordi out, PEACE!
